https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/t4YjVys5D5JRvIagdmQOpkmz0R7.jpg A Sigh tells the story of an affair between a struggling Chinese screenwriter and his young female assistant, its effects on his marriage and the impact on the man himself. A Sigh
